item.title: How To Create A Useful Value Proposition w/ Examples
item.description:
How To Create A Useful Value Proposition w/ Examples

Value proposition is the #1 thing that determines whether people will bother reading more about your product or hit the back button. It's also the main thing you need to test - if you get it right, it will be a huge boost.

item.title: Best Practices for Great Landing Page Design [SlideShare]
item.description:
Best Practices for Great Landing Page Design [SlideShare]

What is one of the easiest ways to increase conversions? A great landing page. What's an efficient tactic to get consumers to convert in one click? An easy-to-navigate landing page. What's one way to make everyone think you and your product is awesome? A killer landing page! I think you get the idea.

item.title: Step-By-Step Guide: Create A Unique Selling Proposition for Your Landing Page
item.description:
Step-By-Step Guide: Create A Unique Selling Proposition for Your Landing Page

In my last post, Best Practices for Great Landing Page Design, I discussed the major elements that go into crafting the perfect page from copy to color to typography. In this post, I'm going to dig deeper into one very important over-arching landing page element: your unique selling proposition (USP).

item.title: Landing Page​s​ 101 ​| ​Landing Page Conversion Course
item.description:
Landing Page​s​ 101 ​| ​Landing Page Conversion Course

In this 11-part course landing page expert Oli Gardner and 10 renowned conversion rate optimization experts (including Rand Fishkin, Peep Laja, Michael Aagaard, Copyblogger, Hubspot and more), will walk you through how to create high-converting landing pages. The course includes step-by-step instructional videos so you can follow along, creating your own landing pages as you go.

item.title: Elements Of A Viral Launch Page - Smashing Magazine
item.description:
Elements Of A Viral Launch Page - Smashing Magazine

Google+, Hipster, Connect.me and Instagram! They all hit a gazillion users in no time at all - and you can even read all about it in everyday media today. This is every product creator's dream. Ok, granted, Google already had their users well before the launch of its social extension.

item.title: How we got 1500+ private BETA sign-ups
item.description:
How we got 1500+ private BETA sign-ups

Our landing page, soliciting BETA users went online in JUNE. The last four months have been a roller coaster ride and now we have come to a new phase: releasing TeamWave, iterating according to the feedback, getting ready to get out of the private beta and open up to the public.

item.title: Alibaba is just the beginning: How B2B marketplaces will thrive (for real, this time)
item.description:
Alibaba is just the beginning: How B2B marketplaces will thrive (for real, this time)

During the heyday of Web 1.0, B2B marketplaces were, we were assured, the next trillion-dollar gold rush. In 2000, Gartner Group was projecting B2B ecommerce transactions would reach $7.3 trillion by 2004. Goldman Sachs predicted $4.5 trillion by 2005. The assumption was that web-based technologies would completely automate virtually all supplier-customer transactions, including retailing, wholesaling...
